thread.title: Trump tweets 'congratulations' to Perez on DNC win
thread.title_full: Trump tweets 'congratulations' to Perez on DNC win

title: Trump tweets 'congratulations' to Perez on DNC win
text:
Trump tweets 'congratulations' to Perez on DNC win Updated 2233 GMT (0633 HKT) February 25, 2017 
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN) President Donald Trump tweeted a congratulatory note to former Labor Secretary Tom Perez for winning the race for chair of the Democratic National Committee on Saturday. "Congratulations to Thomas Perez, who has just been named Chairman of the DNC," the President wrote. "I could not be happier for him, or for the Republican Party!" Developing story - more to come Sections
